name: meat tagine
steps: Heat the oil in the tagine over medium heat.
Place the meat and add the minced garlic, turmeric, cumin, cinnamon, ginger, saffron, and a good pinch of salt and pepper.
Cover and simmer over low heat for 1 hour.
Add 10 cl of water and cook for another hour covered.
Add the prunes 20 minutes before the end of cooking.
Serve hot after sprinkling with sesame seeds.
